title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message
description: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message
OB: When invoking the New Java Package functionality, a message is displayed at the top saying 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists', even when the package name field is empty.
EB: The message should not be displayed when the package name field is empty. If an error occurs, it should be displayed in red with the error icon.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Invoke the New Java Package wizard. 2. Leave the package name field empty. 3. Verify that the message 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists' is displayed at the top.
